item.title: SASS Cheatsheet
item.description: Few months ago, I started working with SASS - I use SCSS syntax cause I care about my mental health. It’s not particularly difficult, and if you learnt CSS, well, you could learn SASS. One of the first thing I wanted was some kind of SASS cheatsheet - so I summarized the main features of SASS in a SASS file. Variables Sass allows you to declare variables that can be used through the stylesheet.
